defaults.noValue: No OOM affected pods currently running

panels.title: Pods with OOM killed containers by last termination reason

targets.expr: sum by(namespace) (rate(moqui_hits_seconds_count{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", metric_name=~"$metric_name"}[$__rate_interval])-rate(moqui_hits_slowhits_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", metric_name=~"$metric_name"}[$__rate_interval])-rate(moqui_hits_errors_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", metric_name=~"$metric_name"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le) (rate(moqui_hits_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", metric_name=~"$metric_name", metric_name=~"$metric_name"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le) (rate(moqui_hits_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job", metric_name=~"$metric_name", metric_name=~"$metric_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

(sum by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$postgres_instance"})) - (sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$postgres_instance"}))

(sum by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$postgres_instance"})) - (sum by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="", job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", persistentvolumeclaim=~"$postgres_instance"}))
